resources.string: An-Najah National University in the city of Nablus, a branch in the city of Tulkarem, and it is one of the largest universities, and it emerged from the dignitaries who contributed significantly to the history of the Palestinian cause. An-Najah National University was founded by the Palestinian politician Hassan Shaker Hammad in 1918.
The book box application was developed to facilitate the exchange of any hard copy documents between ptuk’s students. This application is aiming app providing the easiest ‏and safest exchanges.

Mutaseam Abuzant;Primarily responsible for developing image processing software packages Running on dictated graphic boards. Dealing in large with hardware intensive projects. Written numerous interfaces to graphic printers and scanners.
